variables.description: The Instance ID of the Amazon EC2 instance that you want to associate with this                   Elastic IP address.
variables.name: InstanceId

variables.description: Set to vpc to allocate the address to your Virtual Private Cloud                   (VPC). No other values are supported.
variables.name: Domain
variables.required: Conditional. Required when allocating an address to a VPC

variables.description: The ID that AWS assigns to represent the allocation of the address for use                      with Amazon VPC. This is returned only for VPC elastic IP addresses. Example                      return value: eipalloc-5723d13e
variables.name: AllocationId
